issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement get_supertype correctly
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4957](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4957). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current implementation of get_supertype (used in type coercion logic) is very hacky and should be re-implemented with better unit tests as well.
